name: Nathan Petrelli: Black Sheep Online Quiz | Heroes | 10 Questions

questions.text: Nathan first discovered his ability while flying away from his car. Who was trying to force his car off the road?
questions.explanation:
Linderman's Thugs.

	When Nathan flew away from the driver's seat, his car crashed and his wife suffered a terrible spinal injury. These events were depicted in "Six Months Later".

questions.text: How does Nathan explain Peter's attempt to fly to the press?
questions.correct: Nathan claims that Peter attempted suicide
options: Nathan claims that Peter accidentally fell
Nathan claimed that Peter dreamt the entire thing
Nathan claimed that Peter made the entire thing up
questions.explanation:
Nathan claims that Peter attempted suicide.

	To satisfy the press, Nathan claimed that Peter's flying attempts were actually suicide attempts. Although Peter publicly agreed with the story, he berated Nathan in private.

questions.text: The first time Nathan breaks the sound barrier is when he escapes from the Haitian.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Noah Bennet had the Haitian kidnap Nathan while the Congressional candidate was in Las Vegas. Nathan escaped in his pajamas and broke the sound barrier in his flight.

questions.text: While waiting for a ride back to New York City, whom does Nathan meet?
questions.explanation:
Hiro.

	Hiro announces that he too has powers, but Nathan is skeptical of the enthusiastic office worker-turned-hero. Nathan is heartened when Hiro announces that Nathan has won the election by a "mudslide".

questions.text: Nathan demands four million dollars from Linderman after he meets with Hiro.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Nathan had previously demanded only two million dollars, but he later said "For two million, you got a congressional candidate in your pocket; for four, you'll get a congressman."

questions.text: In which episode does Nathan find out about Suresh's list of people with powers?
questions.explanation:
"The Fix".

	Nathan consulted Mohinder Suresh to find out where Peter was, but Mohinder was unable to help Nathan. "The Fix" aired on 29th January, 2007.

questions.text: Who convinced Nathan to change his mind in regards to "The Exploding Man" crisis?
questions.explanation:
Claire Bennet.

	Claire tells Nathan that the future is not set in stone and makes Nathan question his theory that fate cannot be changed. Nathan shows up in the nick of time and flies an exploding Peter into the sky, saving millions of lives.

questions.text: Nathan is terribly burned and scarred from flying Peter into the sky. Whose blood restores him to complete health?
questions.explanation:
Adam Monroe's blood.

	As Adam and Peter were escaping from the Company's facility, Adam stopped to give a hospitalized Nathan some of his curative blood. These events happened in "Four Months Ago."

questions.text: Nathan convinces Peter to destroy the Shanti virus.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Peter uses his telekinetic powers to stop the vial from breaking and uses his radiation powers to destroy the virus. Thus, Nathan has a hand in saving the world a second time.

questions.text: In what area of the body is Nathan shot in "Powerless"?
questions.explanation:
The chest.

	An unknown assassin shoots Nathan twice in the chest just as he was about to expose his power to the world. The end of the episode leaves his fate undetermined.
